personal.name: Uzer Khatri
personal.description: I uncover insights and craft data-driven solutions to empower smarter decisions and drive impactful outcomes.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With a passion for uncovering patterns and insights, I analyze complex datasets to deliver actionable solutions that drive growth and innovation.

projects.title: Banglore House Price Prediction
projects.description: This project focuses on predicting house prices in Bangalore using advanced machine learning algorithms. By analyzing various features such as location, size, and amenities, the model provides accurate price estimates, assisting buyers and sellers in making informed decisions.

projects.title: Cab Fare Prediction
projects.description: This project involves building a machine learning model to predict cab fares based on factors such as distance, ride duration, location, and time of day. The model aims to provide accurate fare estimates, enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency for cab service providers.

projects.title: Cab Fare Prediction
projects.description: Analyzed Airbnb data using Tableau to create interactive dashboards showcasing pricing patterns, occupancy trends, and neighborhood preferences, providing actionable insights for hosts and travelers.

responsibilities: Analyzed and interpreted datasets to provide actionable insights for training program improvements.
Conducted data cleaning, preprocessing, and visualization to support decision-making processes.
Developed and maintained dashboards in Tableau and Excel to track training program performance metrics
Conducted data cleaning, preprocessing, and exploratory data analysis using Python and SQL on 5+ complex datasets.
Built data visualization dashboards to present key insights, enabling data-driven decision-making.
Developed and implemented machine learning models to solve real-world business problems.
